txt.en: 'We have heard reports of four travellers going missing after exploring near the crypts of Esh-kimâkhi, to the south of Urmâkh. The dead have not risen from their tombs and caused havoc for a century, but I fear the worst now.\n\n'Investigate the grounds of Adakûr near the crypts of Esh-kimâkhi for signs of the travellers. I pray these travellers are merely waylaid, and may still return safely to their families. Please, our need is urgent, go now in search of them.'
You have returned the Dead to rest. Return with the scout to Udlanu in Urmâkh with your report.
There is no twist in this mission.
Your mission is to search for any sign of the missing travellers near the crypts of Esh-kimâkhi.
Mission: The Dead Keep Their Secrets

'That is grim news indeed. I am glad you were not dragged into a shallow tomb with those travellers. We will warn future travellers to stay well clear of the crypts of Esh-kimâkhi. Thank you for returning the Dead to rest. I'm sorry for the danger you encountered, though you seem to have handled yourself quite capably.'
'Your mission, [placeholder], is to search the grounds of Adakûr near the Crypts of Esh-kimâkhi for any sign of this band of missing travellers.'
Complete Mission: The Dead Keep Their Secrets
Your mission is to search for any sign of the missing quartet of travellers near the crypts of Esh-kimâkhi.\n\nSpeak to Udlanu to travel.
